entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Liard River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness this evening then periods of rain beginning after midnight then changing to light snow before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Snow beginning late in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
